title: Wearable technology market share in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014 , by product
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has the highest Share of market and Smart watches has the lowest Share of market.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and minimum Wearable technology products Smart watches.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of market for 4 number of Wearable technology productss.
The maximum Share of market 39.0 is found at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and the minimum is found at Smart watches where Wearable technology products is 11.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has the highest Share of market and Smart watches has the lowest Share of market.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and minimum Wearable technology products Smart watches.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
The Share of market is highest at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and lowest at Wearable technology products Smart watches.
Wearable technology products Wrist sport computers has the second highest value for Share of market.
The lowest value at Wearable technology products Smart watches is 3.55x times less than the highest value at Health and fitness trackers.

The Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has the highest Share of market, followed by Wrist sport computers, and Action cameras headsets and glasses. Down to the Wearable technology products Smart watches which is the lowest.
The Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers tends to be 1.56 percent higher than average.
